response:
"datenprivatsphäre: warum gibt es immer noch unternehmen, die unsere persönlichen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

translation: "data privacy: why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #data protection #privacy"

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still able to collect and sell personal data, despite the importance of data protection and privacy. the use of hashtags such as #datenschutz (data protection) and #privatsphäre (privacy) also helps to reach a wider audience and make the post more discoverable by people interested in the topic.
